description:
Length: 6.64m
Width: 3.43m
Height: 2.65m
Weight: 32t
Top Speed: 60km/h
Power: 800hp/2800rpm
Arms: Theimer 40/88mm KwK cannon
Theimer 12.7mm tank machine gun
Designed and constructed by Isara`s late father, Theimer, this tank`s 360-degree rotating turret, fully automated loading system and other innovations completely revolutionized tank technology. Built to be operated by two, Welkin mans the guns and issues commands to Isara, in control of both the wheel and wireless radio.
Despite its age, it was among the first to use angled plating and other emergent concepts, yielding high performance from an early test age. Its high cost was all that precluded its mass production.
name: Edelweiss Gou
